title: Gamification Training for Identifying Construction Site Hazards in [K-12] Settings

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Construction Site Safety Regulations and Work Processes
context.additional_context: Gamification training conducted in a smartphone-based microlearning environment, aimed at enhancing construction site hazard identification capabilities

learning_goals: Learners can identify the top 10 construction site hazards with 90% accuracy within three days.
Learners can select appropriate response procedures within 10 seconds of simulated risk scenarios via gamification simulations.
Learners can upload and provide feedback on three or more hazard identification cases in the peer assessment system post-training.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
